title: The Future of Farming: 2030 Trends and Predictions

tasks.task: Identify key trends and technologies shaping the future of agriculture in 2030.
subtasks: Explain the role of AI and machine learning in optimizing planting, watering, harvesting, weed control, fertilization, and crop monitoring.
Discuss the emergence of vertical farming and urban agriculture, including their advantages in water and land use, year-round crop production, and reduced transportation emissions.
Describe the development of precision agriculture with real-time data collection, analysis, and actions to enhance efficiency, reduce waste, and promote sustainability.
Highlight the importance of climate-resilient farming practices and the integration of renewable energy in addressing climate change impacts on agriculture.
